item.description:
Newport Polo is always a fun time.  Its as much about socializing as it is watching the actual match.

2011 marks the 20th anniversary season of the Newport International Polo Series. All the stops have been pulled out to celebrate this milestone fittingly, with an all-star lineup of international competitors including the debuts of Kenya and Brazil, a City Series featuring US rivals and many festive events coordinated for fun on and off the field. 

The match starts at 4pm.   Gates open at noon.  Its full tailgating, so small grills, your own food and beverages are all allowed - if not encouraged!

A $30 tailgating spot has been reserved, so a few bucks from each for that would be appreciated.   The tailgating spot does NOT include individual tickets which is $10 per person at the gate.

This is a joint meetup with Massachusetts' "South Shore Hike, Bike, and Social" Group.
item.how_to_find_us: I will give out my cell number to 'yes' RSVPs. We will likely be at the SW corner.
item.name: Newport Polo
